marker.ph: /** @author vassili ...*/
/ All the rooms are declared first so they can be .../
""" You are standing at the end of a road before a small brick building. ..."""
""" You have walked up a hill, still in the forest. The road slopes back ..."""
""" You are in a valley in the forest beside a stream tumbling along a ..."""
""" The forest thins out here to reveal a steep cliff. There is no way ..."""
""" At your feet all the water of the stream splashes into a 2-inch slit ..."""
""" You are in a 20-foot depression floored with bare dirt. Set into the ..."""
""" You are in a small chamber beneath a 3x3 steel grate to the surface. ..."""
""" You are crawling over cobbles in a low passage. There is a dim light ..."""
""" You are in a debris room filled with stuff washed in from the surface. ..."""
""" You are in a splendid chamber thirty feet high. The walls are frozen ..."""
""" At your feet is a small pit breathing traces of white mist. An east ..."""
/ The player and the lantern; required properties. .../
/ Some simple items with no special behavior. .../
/ The grate is an example of two points: vicinity verbs and guards. .../
""" The bird was unafraid when you entered, but as you approach it becomes ..."""
""" The bird was unafraid when you entered, but as you approach it becomes ..."""
""" The stream flows out through a pair of 1 foot diameter sewer pipes. ..."""

/ Global vocabulary verbs, alphabetic order .../
/** @author vassili ...*/
/** Return an item identified by the word. ...*/
/** A special verb bound to a movement direction such as "north", ...*/
/** @author vassili ...*/
/** A verb bound to a room or an item. Its action is typically specified ...*/
/** The subjects of the currently executing command, ...*/
/** Indicate whether any of the current subject words refer to the [item]. ...*/
/** @author vassili ...*/
/** Return a description of the item to display when it's in the player's inventory. ...*/
/** Return a description of the item displayed when the item is ...*/
/** Indicate whether to skip the item when printing a full room description. ...*/
/** Indicate whether the item can be taken by the player. ...*/
/** @author vassili ...*/
/** Print the description of the room and all the items in it. ...*/
